channel.title: Need a ::master
channel.description:
i need help with ::master my source is based on devolution server 7.0
and it didnt come with a ::master so you need to train up your levels can you help me ? plz

item.title: Need a ::master
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

[quote=“0wned_pl0x, post:8, topic:197941”]Here you are:

(This is whats in my serv)

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); sendMessage("You've Been Maxed... Ploxagescape Style"); } }[/quote]

Hehe I was the first one to use a for loop for master, damn that was a long time ago.

Also it should be …

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) addSkillXP(14000000, i); sendMessage("Max stats."); }

So that the message doesn’t repeat.

Read full topic

} } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. I'm in the kkk have a problem?."); }
